name: Christmas Crash (itch) (jasonjumps)
description:
Christmas Edition!

Crash Landing is a 3d jump and slide action game set in a frozen fantasy land. Play as one of the Maji- a lost race of water wielding warriors who face off against the alien forces that have invaded the icy environment. Use air tricks, dodges, hydro blasts and slide combos to score points to buy upgrades and new levels.
